summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5802 for the improvement of East Jefferson Street, from 29th Avenue to 27th Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76487, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
